review_en: Electronics & movie theaters & supermarkets all at once! There are not many places to play near the river. Among them, Technomart is a military monology. There are CGV, E-Mart, electronics stores and restaurants. However, parking facilities are inconvenient. There is a hassle that you have to take coupons from the store you visited to get a discount. Still, it's good for dating when the weather is bad. Also, it's good to suddenly go on a movie date on the weekend," said a movie director, "Since there are usually more vacant seats than other movie theaters in Seoul."

There is a place where you can see the Han River, and the food court was a nice place, and there are various shops, so I would like to look around in detail if I have time. Originally, it was built for electronic shopping, but these days, it is mostly for cultural purposes. For foreigners, it's not a place to spend time separately.
